Methods

RequestBarsInRanges(IHistoricalDataProvider, Instrument, MarketPriceType, Timeframe, GlobalDateTime, GlobalDateTime)

Get bars in specified time ranges This method is available only if InRanges is in SupportedRequestModes

[MustDisposeResource]
public static RequestBarsResult RequestBarsInRanges(this IHistoricalDataProvider me, Instrument instrument, MarketPriceType priceType, Timeframe timeframe, GlobalDateTime startTime, GlobalDateTime endTime)

Parameters

me IHistoricalDataProvider
instrument Instrument
priceType MarketPriceType
timeframe Timeframe
startTime GlobalDateTime

The start time of the requested range. The time can be defined in any time zone (for example it can be set as a local time or UTC time)

endTime GlobalDateTime

The end time of the requested range. The time can be defined in any time zone (for example it can be set as a local time or UTC time)

Returns

RequestBarsResult

Request result. You have to dispose it explicitly after usage

Remarks

All returned data is order by time from oldest to newest bars For tick data Tick O=H=L=C=tick price

RequestBarsSince(IHistoricalDataProvider, Instrument, MarketPriceType, Timeframe, GlobalDateTime)

Get latest historical data started from specified time This method is available only if Since is in SupportedRequestModes

[MustDisposeResource]
public static RequestBarsResult RequestBarsSince(this IHistoricalDataProvider me, Instrument instrument, MarketPriceType priceType, Timeframe timeframe, GlobalDateTime startFrom)

Parameters

me IHistoricalDataProvider
instrument Instrument
priceType MarketPriceType
timeframe Timeframe
startFrom GlobalDateTime

The start time to get data from. The time can be defined in any time zone (for example it can be set as a local time or UTC time)

Returns

RequestBarsResult

Request result. You have to dispose it explicitly after usage

Remarks

All returned data is order by time from oldest to newest bars For tick data Tick O=H=L=C=tick price

RequestBarsUpTo(IHistoricalDataProvider, Instrument, MarketPriceType, Timeframe, GlobalDateTime, int)

Get barsBack bars before specified time endTime (including this time) This method is available only if BackBarsUpTo is in SupportedRequestModes

[MustDisposeResource]
public static RequestBarsResult RequestBarsUpTo(this IHistoricalDataProvider me, Instrument instrument, MarketPriceType priceType, Timeframe timeframe, GlobalDateTime endTime, int barsBack)

Parameters

me IHistoricalDataProvider
instrument Instrument
priceType MarketPriceType
timeframe Timeframe
endTime GlobalDateTime

The last time to start getting data back. The time can be defined in any time zone (for example it can be set as a local time or UTC time)

barsBack int

Defines how many bars back from endTime must be loaded

Returns

RequestBarsResult

Request result. You have to dispose it explicitly after usage

Remarks

All returned data is ordered by time from oldest to newest bars For tick data Tick O=H=L=C=tick price

RequestLatestBars(IHistoricalDataProvider, Instrument, MarketPriceType, Timeframe, int)

Get last N historical data bars This method is available only if LastBarCount is in SupportedRequestModes

[MustDisposeResource]
public static RequestBarsResult RequestLatestBars(this IHistoricalDataProvider me, Instrument instrument, MarketPriceType priceType, Timeframe timeframe, int lastBarCount)

Parameters

me IHistoricalDataProvider
instrument Instrument
priceType MarketPriceType
timeframe Timeframe
lastBarCount int

Returns

RequestBarsResult

Request result. You have to dispose it explicitly after usage

Remarks

All returned data is order by time from oldest to newest bars For tick data Tick O=H=L=C=tick price
